captions.text:
Who cares about
derek zoolander anyway ?

The man has only one look,
for christ's sake !

Doesn't anyone notice this ?
I feel like I'm taking
crazy pills !

I invented
the piano key necktie !

What have you done, derek ?
Nothing !

And I will be a monkey's uncle
if I have you ruin this for me !

Because if you can't
get the job done, then I will !

One look ?
I don't think so !

Yeah, baby !
That's what I've been
waiting for !

I love that kid.
Dumb as a stump, but I love him.

Oh, derek, you did it !
That was amazing !

Oh, yeah, that too.
But, derek, you saved
the prime minister of malaysia !
